name: X10media-MP3-Search-Engine

matches.text: Cannot connect to the database. Possibly, the X10Media Mp3 Search engine is not installed. Click here, to install it.

matches.version: (?-mix:<meta name="publisher" content="x10media`s Mp3 Search Engine V\.([\d\.]+)"\/>)
(?-mix:<meta name="dc\.rights" content="x10media`s Mp3 Search Engine V\.([\d\.]+)"\/>)
(?-mix:<meta name="dc\.publisher" content="x10media`s Mp3 Search Engine V\.([\d\.]+)"\/>)
(?-mix:<meta name="owner" content="x10media`s Mp3 Search Engine V\.([\d\.]+)"\/>)

dorks: "powered by x10media.com a MP3 Search Script"
"This search engine is in no way intended for illegal downloads. "
